form.title: Contact us
form.intro: Do you have questions or want to discuss cooperation opportunities? Fill out the form and we will get in touch with you.

intro.heading: Scientific and research cooperation
intro.paragraph1: Our goal is to connect science with practice. We support both individual researchers and institutions that want to innovate in the fields of pharmaceuticals, medicine and biotechnology. If you have an idea for a research project or need support in implementing the experimental part - we invite you to contact us.
intro.paragraph2: We work with universities, startups, research centers and companies in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors. Regardless of the stage of your idea - from conception to analysis of results - we can help with its implementation and publication.

scope.heading: Opportunities for cooperation:
items: Implementation of laboratory experiments and clinical trials
Data analysis, statistics, elaboration of results
Support in the preparation of grant proposals and publications
Research assignments for the needs of institutions or private companies

note: We do not require a formal affiliation - what matters is the idea, the goal and the willingness to cooperate.
